revised_title: The Action of Light on Bacteria: The Effect of Different Wavelengths on Bacillus anthracis
tldr: The author investigates the effect of different wavelengths of light on the germination of Bacillus anthracis spores. The study reveals that the spores are most susceptible to the blue-violet region of the spectrum, with minimal effect in the infra-red, red, and orange-yellow regions.
